name: DERANGED s/s T-shirt (movie based on Ed Gein)
description:
Limited print of one of many movies based on the life and saga of the infamous Ed Gein.

Violet and black ink print on white t-shirts, front side only, men and women sizes.

name: Texas Chainsaw Massacre (1973) S/S T-shirt
description:
Limited print of the original 1973 release of the infamous Texas Chainsaw Massacre by Toby Hooper.

Front and back print on white s/s t-shirts, available in both men and women sizes.

Front side: spot color process print of original movie poster

Back side: family portrait in black ink

name: Hate/War Productions Promotional Koozies
description:
Official Hate/War Productions promotional koozies;
Logo on one side, sigil on other side.
 - Black Koozies/white ink
 - Retro Camouflage/metallic black ink
 - Camouflage/metallic black ink

name: Hate/War Productions Promotional Logo T-shirts
description:
Official promotional t-shirts for Hate/War Productions.
Black t-shirt with white discharge print, available in men and women sizes.
Front side: official Hate/War Productions logo
Back side: Embrace the Hate in old English font across bottom
Sleeves: sigil

name: Viral Load "Brutalized Beyond Belief" PRE-ORDER
description:
Never before printed, get this exclusive print of the sick hicks debut album "Brutalized Beyond Belief".
 - Front side: album cover art by TX art/tattoo legend Jon Zig; spot color process print; white, violet, red, and black ink.
 - Back side: single (spot) color of album title.
 - Right sleeve: TXDM design in single color white ink.

All on adult/male sizes only, small to 3xl.

This is a PRE-ORDER, and will be available till December 23rd, 2013.

name: Friedrich Nietzsche "der Übermensch" T-shirt
description:
Exclusive print of the infamous German philosopher Friedrich Nietzsche, known for his 'critical texts on religion, morality, contemporary culture, philosophy and science; displaying a fondness for metaphor, irony and aphorism.'

Front side: line illustration with name and title.

Back side:
"The doctrine of equality! … But there is no more venomous poison in existence: for it appears to be preached by justice itself, when it is actually the end of justice … "Equality to the equal; inequality to the unequal" — that would be true justice speaking: and its corollary, 'never make the unequal equal.'"

Black ink print on Natural color t-shirts, available in both men and women sizes.

name: Viral Load LOGO/TXDM koozies
description:
Official, exclusive, and limited print of VIRAL LOAD drink koozies; keep your beverage cold and drink in style.

White ink print on black neopreme drink koozies.

name: Jack the Ripper "Whitechapel Tour 1888-1891" T-shirt
description:
Official and exclusive t-shirt of the notorious Jack the Ripper, the unidentified serial killer who was active in the largely impoverished areas in and around the Whitechapel district of London in 1888 to 1891.

Front side: collage of the unsolved murder mystery of the infamous Jack the ripper, black half tone print.

Back side: tour/murder dates in black ink print.

Available in both male and female sizes.

name: Meat Shits "Dead Whore" s/s T-shirt
description:
Limited prints of the infamous "A Dead Whore is a Good Whore" t-shirt.
Front side: artwork by Lou Rusconi in white and red ink print.
Back side: text that reads "If Youre Offended by the Word CUNT, You're Obviously a CUNT. So shut the Fuck up you Fuckin' CUNT." in bold white ink print.

Available in both men and women sizes.

name: GRIND Michael Vick into Dog Chow
description:
Perfect print for any avid animal, dog, and/or pit bull lover; and/or anyone who plainly hate Michael Vick for the scumbag that he is.

Wear this t-shirt proudly!!!

Tan and scarlet red ink on black s/s t-shirts.

Available in both men and women sizes.

name: Haemorrhage "Obnoxious" s/s T-shirt
description:
Exclusive and limited prints of the 1995 split EP release (with Christ Denied); OBNOXIOUS. Limited set of prints and will NOT be reprinted.
 
Front side: Obnoxious cover

Back side: song title off of EP "Fermented Post-Mortem Disgorgement" in eroded lettering. 

Single color white ink print on front and back.
MEN sizes only.

name: Morbid Angel original LOGO s/s t-shirt
description: Single color, white ink print of the original Morbid Angel logo from the early-mid 80s.

name: Aleister Crowley "Frater Perdurabo" T-shirt
description:
Official and exclusive t-shirt of Aleister Crowley, also known as "Frater Perdurabo", the English occultist, mystic, ceremonial magician, poet and mountaineer, who was responsible for founding the religious philosophy of Thelema.

Front side: photo of an elderly Aleister Crowley with name and title in Middle Saxony font.

Back side: unicursal hexagram, and infamous quote:
"Adaptation to one's environment makes for a sort of survival; but after all, the supreme victory is only won by those who prove themselves of so much hardier stuff than the rest that no power on earth is able to destroy them. The people who have really made history are the martyrs."

White ink print on both sides.

Available in both MEN and WOMEN sizes

name: ILSA: She Wolf of the SS T-shirt
description:
Limited prints of the imfamous nazisploitation film starring Dyanne Thorne as "ILSA: She Wolf of the SS". Original poster print in red and black ink white t-shirts.

Available in both men and women sizes.

name: Dead "Slaves of Abysmal Perversity" T-shirt
description:
Exclusive and Limited prints of the "Slaves of Abysmal Perversity" EP cover by German sleaze metallers DEAD.

Front side: original cover in white and red ink print on black t-shirts, red and black ink on white t-shirts.

Back side: DEAD logo with song text "I'm Your Master, You're My Slave", white ink on black t-shirts / black ink on white t-shirts.

name: Mentors (the) "Sex Slave" T-shirt
description:
Official, exclusive, and original artwork that pays homage to the true "Kings of Sleaze", the Mentors. Original artwork in white ink print on black s/s t-shirts.

Available in both MEN and WOMEN sizes.

name: Rasputin "Mad Monk" T-shirt
description:
Official and exclusive t-shirt of the "Mad Monk"; Grigori Yefimovich Rasputin, a Russian mystic and advisor to the Romanovs - the Russian Imperial family. Regarded as a saintly mystic, visionary, healer and prophet; but to his enemies, as a debauched religious charlatan, heavily interested in sexual relations with his followers.

Front side: photo of Rasputin with name and infamous reference in both Russian and Western alphabet with Russian Orthodox symbol in single color white half tone print.

Back side: Russian Orthodox ceremonial robe design in single color white ink print.

Available in both men and women sizes.

name: CALIGULA: The Movie (1979) T-shirt
description:
Limited prints of the 1979 PENTHOUSE production film directed by Tinto Brass, concerning the rise and fall of Roman Emperor Gaius Caesar Germanicus, better known as Caligula.

Gold Yellow and red print on black s/s t-shirts.

Available on men and women sizes.

name: H.H. Holmes "Worlds Fair Hotel" T-shirt
description:
Official and exclusive advertisement (spoof) print of the infamous World Fair Hotel operated by the putrid swindler and serial killer H.H. Holmes. Printed on black and sand t-shirts.

Front side: gray (base), burgundy, and tan ink print on black t-shirts. Dim gray (base), burgundy, and black ink print on sand t-shirts.

Back side: single color white ink print on black t-shirts.
White and black ink print on sand t-shirts.

Available in both men and women sizes.

name: Josef Mengele Autographed T-shirt
description:
Exclusive and autographed t-shirt of the infamous physician Josef Mengele, better known as the "Angel of Death."

This is the same doctor and scientist that inspired and which the song of the same infamous name that SLAYER wrote about. Thus, if you do not know who this is, then you're NOT a true SLAYER fan.

Available in MEN size only, WOMEN sizes coming soon.

name: Tits N' Tacos Promotional T-shirt
description: New, exclusive, and officially distributed prints for Tits N' Tacos out of Huntington Beach, California. Men sizes: Single color Tan ink print on front and back side. - Front side: logo on left breast pocket area. - Back side: large print. Women size: single color pink ink print front side only. Tits N Tacos Facebook page

name: Richard Ramirez "...see you in Disneyland" T-shirt
description:
Official and exclusive print of the infamous southern California "Night Stalker" Richard Ramirez.

Front side: Photo of Richard Ramirez in prison garment with infamous quote "No big deal death always comes with the territory I'll see you in Disneyland" in tan and violet half tone print.

Back side: photo collage with splatter pentagram, and quote "You maggots make me sick, I will be avenged, Lucifer dwells within us all"; Columbia blue ink print.

Available in both men and women sizes.

name: Hail Death Productions Promotional Logo T-shirt
description:
Official Hail Death Productions promotional t-shirts, available in men and women sizes.
Front side: official logo across chest/breast area
Back side: design of saw blade, crossing scythes, and chaos star.

Printed in gray ink.

name: Zodiac (Killer) T-shirt
description:
Official and exclusive t-shirt of the Zodiac Killer, who operated in Northern California in the late 1960s and early 1970s, and who's identity is still unknown.

Front side: original artwork in white and dark gray ink print.

Back side: infamous deciphered cryptogram.
___________________________________
I LIKE KILLING PEOPLE BECAUSE IT IS SO MUCH FUN IT IS MORE FUN THAN KILLING WILD GAME IN THE FORREST BECAUSE MAN IS THE MOST DANGEROUS ANIMAL OF ALL TO KILL SOMETHING GIVES ME THE MOST THRILLING EXPERIENCE IT IS EVEN BETTER THAN GETTING YOUR ROCKS OFF WITH A GIRL THE BEST PART OF IT IS THAT WHEN I DIE I WILL BE REBORN IN PARADISE AND THE ONES I HAVE KILLED WILL BECOME MY SLAVES I WILL NOT GIVE YOU MY NAME BECAUSE YOU WILL TRY TO SLOW ME DOWN OR STOP MY COLLECTING OF SLAVES FOR MY AFTER LIFE 
___________________________________

Available in both men and women sizes.

name: ROTT "Putrid Art" T-shirt
description:
Official and exclusive t-shirt of L.A. slam death/grind band ROTT, new design with new logo by Steve Crow (of Condemned) and artwork by Dan's Putrid Art (Indonesia).
White and red ink print on black s/s t-shirts, front side only.

name: Albert Fish "Gray Man" T-shirt
description:
Official and exclusive t-shirt of the notorious Gray Man, Hamilton Howard "Albert" Fish; a child rapist and cannibal, that boasted that he had killed and eaten children in every state, and at one time put the figure at around 100.

Front side: mug shot in gray base and steel blue ink print.

Back side: x-ray photo with quote 
"What a thrill that will be if I have to die in the electric chair. It will be the supreme thrill. The only one I haven't tried." 
in white ink print.

Available in both men and women t-shirts.

name: Andrei Chikatilo "Red Ripper Tour 1978-1990" T-shirt
description:
Official and exclusive t-shirt of the notorious Ukrainian-Russian cannibal and butcher of Rostov, Andrei Romanovich Chikatilo; who murdered a minimum of 52 women and children between 1978 and 1990.

Front side: trial photo from post-Soviet court in pastel yellow base and red ink print.

Back side: all 52 tour dates  from 1978 to 1990 in yellow and red ink print.

Available in both men and women t-shirts.

name: Torsofuck "Fist Fucking" T-shirt
description:
Exclusive and official Torsofuck t-shirts with new and original artwork based on the infamous "Fistfucking Her Decomposed Cadaver."
To be printed on black and cobblestone t-shirts.
 
Front side: light tan base with brown and maroon ink print on black t-shirts; brown, maroon, and black ink print on cobblestone t-shirts.

Back side: logo and lyrics in brown ink on black and cobblestone t-shirts; reads "I brutally smash my fist up her cunt and rip her entrails out. Double fistfucking her asshole."

name: Richard Kuklinski "Iceman" T-shirt
description:
Official and exclusive t-shirt that pays homage to the man they called the ICEMAN, Mr. Richard Kuklinski, notorious for his career as a hitman for Newark's Gambino crime family and New Yorks Five Families.

Front side: white and light blue half tone ink print.

Back side: white half tone ink print, with direct quote: 
"...what I liked most was the hunt, the challenge of what the thing was. The killing for me was secondary. I got no rise as such out of it… for the most part. But the figuring it out, the challenge -- the stalking and doing it right, successfully -- that excited me a lot. The greater the odds against me, the more juice I got out of it."

Available in both men and women sizes

name: Elizabeth Bathory (Erszebet Bathori) "Blood Countess" T-shirt
description:
Exclusive and official t-shirt that pays homage to the infamous Hungarian "Blood Countess." 
Front side: framed famous portrait; in white and metallic gold ink. Back side: Bathori coat of arm; metallic silver ink print. 
Available in both men and women sizes.

name: Rompeprop "Porn to be Wild" T-shirt
description:
Exclusive and officially licensed Rompeprop "Porn to be Wild" t-shirt. 
Front side: 'Groovy Goregrind' graphic from Gurgle Cummics inlay; white and medium blue ink print. 
Back side: 'Porn to be Wild' lettering with Japanese Hentai illustrations in each letter; white and medium blue ink print.

Available in both men and women sizes.

name: Putrid Pile "Blood Drinker" T-shirts
description:
Exclusive and officially licensed Putrid Pile "Blood Drinker" t-shirts. Front side: original artwork by Blakened Graphics, white and red ink print. 
Back side: verse from "Blood Runs Red" from the "House of Dementia" release; "Sticky from the blood you've bled..." in white and red ink print.

name: Ted Bundy R.I.P. Tribute T-shirt
description:
Official and exclusive Ted Bundy tribute t-shirts, available in both Men and Women sizes. 
Front side: Courtroom photo of the infamous Ted Bundy in white ink print. 
Back side: quote from Ted Bundy; "We serial killers are your husbands, we are your sons, we are everywhere. And there will be more of your children dead tomorrow" in white ink print.

name: Lividity "Graveyard Delicacy" (Riddick Art) T-shirt
description:
Exclusive and officially licensed t-shirt of Lividity. 
Front side: original artwork by Mark Riddick, two color print in white and orange ink. 
Back side: text, "Hear the Wenches Scream at Night" in white ink.

name: Christ Denied "Brutal Christophobic Death Metal" T-shirt
description:
Exclusive and officially licensed prints of one of Spain's best and brutal underground death metallers, Christ Denied. 
Front side: logo in white and red ink print. 
Back side: BRUTAL CHRISTOPHOBIC DEATH METAL with little man throwing away a cross in the trashcan where it belongs, in white ink print. 
Left sleeve: Christian symbol crossed out in white and red ink print.

name: Ed Gein "Butcher of Plainfeild" T-shirt
description:
Exclusive and official Ed Gein "Butcher of Plainfeild" tribute t-shirt. Front side: two color, red and white ink print of one of many of infamous Gein photos with blood splatter and lettering. 
Back side: single color white ink print with Ed Gein quote "I had a compulsion to do it." Printed on black 100% cotton t-shirts.

This is the man that inspired the plots and characters of Psycho, the Texas Chainsaw Massacre, and Silence of the Lambs. A t-shirt for real enthusiasts of the macabre, horror movies, serial killers and sociopaths, and true Slayer fans.

name: Vlad Dracula III Tribute T-shirt
description:
This t-shirt pays homage to the original and true Vlad Dracula, the third son of the Order of the Dragon. White ink print of wood engraved illustrations on front and back. 

Available in both men and women sizes.
